scripts.compose: docker compose up -d && pnpm prisma:generate && pnpm prisma:migrate-dev
scripts.prisma:generate: cd apps/api && pnpm dlx prisma generate
scripts.prisma:migrate-dev: cd apps/api && pnpm dlx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:push: cd apps/api && pnpm dlx prisma db push
scripts.prisma:studio: cd apps/api && pnpm dlx prisma studio
